= IoC Container - AutoDart Introduction =
The IoC Container for Dart

= Details =

{{{
class Baz{
}

class Bar{
  Baz baz;
  Bar(this.baz);
}

class Foo{
  Bar bar;
  Foo(this.bar);
}

var main(){
  var b = new AutoBuilder();
  b.register((c, p) => new Baz())
    .As("Baz");
  
  b.register((c, p) => new Bar(c.resolve("Baz")))
    .As("Bar");
  
  b.register((c, p) => new Foo(c.resolve("Bar")))
    .As("Foo");
  
  var c = b.build();
  
  var foo = c.resolve("Foo") as Foo;
}
}}}
